lead_paragraph: SOLOMON--Blanche, on June 6, 2016, after a long and hard battle with a relentless lung tumor, at 86 years old. Beloved wife of the late Arthur J. Solomon. Loving mother of Lisa G. Liebman, her son-in-law Steven H. Charles Liebman, and the late Gregg C. Solomon. Cherished grandmother of Samuel Alex Liebman. She will live on in our hearts and minds forever, and we will never forget her love and the positive impact that she had on all of our lives. Private graveside service will be held on Thursday. 1/3
